38 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

And here’s all of the coding in ReportPlayer.java

[code]import java.io.;
import java.text.DateFormat;
import java.text.;
import java.util.*;

public class ReportPlayer {

// Defines the format of the date. Ex: 19/4/2009
String date = new SimpleDateFormat("dd/MM/yyyy").format(new Date());

// Defines the format of the time. Ex: 07:04:19
String time = new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss").format(new Date());

// A player can only report another player if:
// The other player is online
// They are not reporting themselves
// They have not reported someone within 60 seconds
void reportPlayer(final client c) {

	// Converts the byte to the players name
	String receivedPlayerName = misc.longToPlayerName(c.inStream
			.readQWord());

	// This method reads 1 byte from the Message Data buffer, starting with
	// the byte referred to by DataOffset and returns it as an Integer
	// (signed 2-byte) integer value in the range 0 to 255.
	int rule = c.inStream.readUnsignedByte();

	// Returns the time left before the next report is allowed
	int timer = c.reportTimer / 2;

	// If there is a valid report the report information is printed onto the
	// Server command prompt
	if (receivedPlayerName != null
			&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
			&& c.reportTimer == 0 && receivedPlayerName != c.playerName) {
		System.out.println("[Server Report]: " + c.playerName
				+ " reported " + receivedPlayerName);
	}
	switch (rule) {

	// Rule 1: Offensive Language
	case 0:

		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false
				|| c.playerName == receivedPlayerName) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0 && receivedPlayerName != c.playerName) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Offensive language");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 2: Item Scamming
	case 1:

		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Item Scamming");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 3: Password Scamming
	case 2:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Password Scamming");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 4: Bug Abuse
	case 3:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Bug Abuse");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 5: Staff Impersonation
	case 4:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Staff Impersonation");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 6: Account Sharing
	case 5:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Acount sharing / trading");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 7: Macroing
	case 6:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Macroing");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 8: Multiple Logging
	case 7:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Multi Logging in");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 9: Encouraging others to break rules
	case 8:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Making others break rules");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 10: Abuse of Customer Support
	case 9:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Misuse of customer support");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 11: Advertising Website
	case 10:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Advertising / website");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 12: Real World Item trading
	case 11:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sendMessage("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Real world item trading");
			c.sendMessage("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;
	}
}

// Writes recieved data to a specified file
// Makes use of the java.io functions, Buffered Writer, etc
void report(String msg) {

	BufferedWriter bw = null;

	try {
		bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./reports/Reports.txt",
				true));
		bw.write(msg + " | On " + date + " At " + time);
		bw.newLine();
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} catch (IOException ioe) {
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} finally {
		if (bw != null)
			try {
				bw.close();
			} catch (IOException ioe2) {
				misc.println("Error saving server reports..");
			}
	}
}

}[/code]
